Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: There was a smaller excess of MB in antiplatelet users vs nonusers with ICH ( OR , 1 . 7 ; 95 % CI , 1 . 3 - 2 . 3 ; P < 0 . 001 ) , but findings were similar for antiplatelet users with IS / TIA ( OR , 1 . 4 ; 95 % CI , 1 . 2 - 1 . 7 ; P < 0 . 001 ; P difference = 0 . 25 ) .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| ICH |
| IS / TIA |

Explanation:
ICH stands for Intracerebral Hemorrhage and IS / TIA stands for Ischemic Stroke / Transient Ischemic Attack. These are the two disease entities found in the given paragraph.

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

ICH stands for Intracerebral Hemorrhage and IS / TIA stands for Ischemic Stroke / Transient Ischemic Attack. These are the two disease entities found in the given paragraph. The other terms in the paragraph, such as "MB", "OR", "95 % CI", "P", and "P difference" do not clearly refer to diseases, so they have been removed from the table.
